lines.text: Well, I've got an idea, but I should <c=#FF00FF>check the body</c> first. Don't wanna go off on a wild goose chase.
...Hm. Are we sure that's a bullet hole?
Yeah. I mean... maybe someone cast Portable Hole on him? Wouldn't that do the trick?
You think the Go Wizard cast Portable Hole on... himself?
Well, I dunno if that'd kill him, is the thing. I've never used that spell, so...
Like, what happens with his vital organs if there's a hole there? Do they vanish? Or do they just get warped out of the way?
Well, he's bleedin' pretty bad, so... if it is Portable Hole, then that answers your question.
Still doesn't make any sense that he'd do it. And nothing in the spellbook said it could backfire...
A-and I've... I've inspected the body! It's... that hole is definitely a <c=#80CC80>bullet hole.</c>
Oh. Well, if you've already checked it out, then... I guess we've gotta try something else.
(Probably that <c=#FF00FF>bullet wound,</c> since we know for sure what it is. I should bring that up with Leo.)
And who do you think did that? Was there a <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> somewhere around?
''Maybe'' ain't gonna cut it, Seeker. Try again once you've got <c=#FF00FF>evidence</c> a Go Wizard was here.
